data.text: @Cali_Wolverine Sorry to hear that, Jeff! Unfortunately, we here at Twitter don't have access to the reservation system and are therefore not able to reinstate your seat. Kindly call the Service Center: https://t.co/Dd8prkCoEf. My colleagues will gladly have a look into your booking. /Mac

urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Certain events, such as adverse weather conditions, technical problems in the baggage handling areas or a bag tag becoming detached, can sometimes lead to baggage items being damaged or not arriving at the destination airport at the same time as their owners.

data.text: @Mike1625 When have you reported the bag as missing, Mike? While I can't promise we're able to speed up things for you, you are welcome to send us the reference no. on your loss report via DM and we'll try to have local colleagues at VLC look into the case to provide you with update. /Ina
